name: Submit.zip
description:
WARNING: THIS GAME MIGHT MAKE YOU RAGE Reason for making the game:

This game was made for Global Game Jam 2021! We worked hard the past few days and might update this game in the near future. Hope you enjoy!

Features:
  • Clickable folders and icons
  • Ads that block your screen
  • Camera shake
  • Inverted camera
  • Post processing effects
  • And so much more!
Credits: NameRoleItchJason KozinProgrammerHereDan HeyenProgrammerHereMichael AspinallProgrammerHereMat FerraroProgrammerHereHannah TrautzArtist/DesignerHereDaShawn Jones Artist/DesignerHere
